title: Kinnikuman x Cup Noodles: Power Up shita Pro-hen

alternative_titles.en: Kinnikuman x Cup Noodles: Powered Up Pro Edition
alternative_titles.ja: カップヌードルCM「カップヌードルPRO パワーアップしたPRO 篇」

synopsis: No matter how superhuman they may be, Kinnikuman and Terryman cannot resist getting older, so together with PRO, they will fight against the wall of age it which is more formidable than any other rival.
